item.title: Command Line Interface
item.description: The coherent-guic-cli is a tool that helps you create and develop components from the GameUIComponents suite. It can also setup a development environment with live reload that will allow you to easily create a UI using the components. Getting Started # To install the cli open a console and type: npm i -g coherent-guic-cli This will install the cli as a global module and will make it available from everywhere.
